sentences.sCn: 百分之五十的市场占有率是可实现的。

sentences.sContent: It is often a good idea to start with smaller, easily achievable goals.
sentences.sCn: 以较小的、容易实现的目标来做开端经常是个好主意。

synos.tran: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的

trans.tranCn: 可完成的； 可达到的
trans.tranOther: If you say that something you are trying to do is achievable, you mean that it is possible for you to succeed in doing it
